entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
